metadata.title: CVE-2022-32213 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The llhttp parser <v14.20.1, <v16.17.1 and <v18.9.1 in the http module inNode.js does not correctly parse and validate Transfer-Encoding headers andcan lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode72 - 12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3.2
nodejs - 12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '12.22.9~dfsg-1ubuntu3.2').
